document_data.mainbody:
Wands of horror were enchanted wands that held multiple charges of fear-causing spells unleashed upon command.
Wands of horror were carved and twisted wands,  in length. They were usually created using red wood or ivory. The total number of charges varied per wand.
Each of these wands held several charges of the horror spell that could be discharged at will using a wands command word. Upon expenditure of a wands last charge, it disintegrated.
*Elytharra Dinnesmore, the half-elven wizard wife of Ulbrec Dinnesmore, the speaker of Targos in Ten Towns circa the .
